resources.string: If you have any issues or suggestions, please contact me.

The Bibles are installed in the following order: English, Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese.

 According to the device, the installation could be long.

 If you return to your home screen, the installation will continue. You will be informed by the notifications when it will be finished.

 Meanwhile, you can read the Bible in English (Books menu), read the Help or make other things with your device.
Mark all above as not read
Some menu options have been disabled during the installation.
You don\'t have a plan of reading yet. Please select a theme or a book in the list.

Honour your father and your mother

Hi, I\'m a Christian programmer and made this application with my heart to serve the Lord. The end of time is close with tribulations, antichrist, Jesus and the final judgment. Whattt! Are you serious? Yes, I\'m serious, signs are everywhere. This application, giving the real Word of God, can help you be strong during this period when the devil will try to deceive you more than never and to be ready when Christ will come back. Remember yourselves that the devil knows the Scriptures. I added only good original Bibles (no re-edition where possible) in several languages, I can understand, to help you find Jesus because he\'s the only way towards our Father. Don\'t remain in the darkness little children of God. Be good to your brothers and sisters, share the word of God, love, pray, repent, have faith, joy, follow the commandments, stop your sins and sow abundantly. Let\'s follow Jesus, the good Shepherd, our only saviour… God bless you. Amen.
John 14.6: Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.
John 15.12: This is my commandment, That ye love one another, as I have loved you.
John 10.11: I am the good shepherd: the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep.
Psalms 23.3: He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name\'s sake.

Psalms 23.4: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.

Psalms 23.5: Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies: thou anointest my head with oil; my cup runneth over.

Psalms 23.6: Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life: and I will dwell in the house of the LORD for ever.
1Corinthians 3.16: Know ye not that ye are the temple of God, and that the Spirit of God dwelleth in you?

1Corinthians 3.17: If any man defile the temple of God, him shall God destroy; for the temple of God is holy, which temple ye are.


Search in the Bible Syntax: <book>
Syntax: <book> <chapter>
Syntax: <book> <chapter> <verse>
Syntax: <book> <expression>
Syntax: <book> <chapter> <expression>
Syntax: <expression>


Examples:
• Genesis
Gives chapter 1 of Genesis by default

• Genesis 1
Gives chapter 1 of Genesis

• Genesis 1 5
Gives the verse 1.5 of Genesis :)

• Genesis fire
Searches in Genesis all occurrences of \'fire\'

• 1 6 lord
Searches in Genesis chapter 6 all occurrences of \'lord\'

• abraham
Searches \'abraham\' in all the Bible

• Revelation horse
Searches the horses of the Revelation :)

• 66 babylone
Searches \'babylone\' in book 66 (Revelation)

• peter%church
Searches in the order, \'peter\' and \'church\' in all the Bible


Remarks:
- The book names are case sensitive, so select them in the list.
- Put accents in your words if they have:
Example: jézabel (French), jezebel (English)
- if a search gives no result, please check the title tab to be sure you are not filtering your favorites AND you are not searching in another Bible (other language)
Example: Élie (French), Elijah (English), Elia (Italian), Elías (Spanish)


Translate To get the translation of a verse, chapter, result (search result) into a language: make a long press on a verse. A dialog box will appear and it will be able to Open/Copy/Share it. You will see that translations are very close.


Search in the Favorites Searching in the favorites will not search in the Bible. It will only filter the favorites you saved. There is a Clear button to clear the filter and get them all.


Favorites There are two types of favorites:
- normal favorite: use it when you love a verse and want to read it again
- favorite reading (passage)

You can change the normal favorite symbol in Settings menu.
In a next version, you will be able to change the Reading symbol.


How to create an article? - Context menu: Start editing article
- Create an article
- Select it
- Select verses (From/To) of same chapter
- Menu: Articles/My articles
- Open your article
- Manage sections
- To share your articles with the users: send me the source. Please don\'t add too much text, just some titles, let the verses speak.


Tips - Let the application resident, the memory is well managed
- Search result is useful to search verses in a language and get the exact same verses in another language, to learn, compare texts, check words…
- Use my widget
- Create a plan of reading to force you to read a complete book


Agreement This application will remain totally free, without advertising, redirections, offline and will not be sold. It is not a demo but a complete version.


Contact For any issues or suggestions, please contact me (About menu).

Read this parable and learn the relationship between forgiveness and judgment.

References 40 7 1 2
42 6 37 37 Parable 40 18 23 35

The following list is incomplete and has no sequential order.
Some prophecies are already actual.
The other prophecies can come very quickly.



Please, pray to God and repent of your sins in the name of Jesus Christ, it is time to be born again Christian, to follow the commandments, to love, to forgive, to be a saint and to be included in the book of life. Give your life to Jesus Christ, time is short.



• Signs with the sun, the moon, the stars and the sky

• Injustice, iniquity (sins, extreme injustice)

• Apostasy (without religious faith)

• Earthquakes

• Other catastrophic events

• Famines

• Pestilences

• False doctrines

• Mockers

• The evil becomes good and the good becomes bad. Darkness becomes light and light becomes darkness

• The rise of evil

• Nation against nation, kingdom against kingdom

• Persecution of Christians and Jews

• Red heifer

• Dreams and visions

• Jews will say the Messiah is coming

• A kingdom will rise on kingdoms

• The Jewish people will make a new covenant and break the covenant with God

• Construction of the third temple

• Peace and safety, sudden destruction

• Seal of God

• Rapture of the bride (church) of Jesus Christ (the rapture should take place just before the coming of the devil on the earth)

• The coming of the Antichrist

• Battle of Armageddon

• Destruction of the new Babylon

• Destruction of Israel

• Destruction of the world

• False christs and false prophets

• New world religion (religion of Antichrist) and probably a new world government

• The Antichrist will proclaim to be God in a holy place, with the help of the false prophet

• Battle of Gog and Magog

• The two witnesses (prophets) of God from the end of times

• The two prophets of God have the power to close the sky, stop the rains and create all the wounds on the earth

• Death of the two prophets of God by the beast

! Worship of the beast and the image of the beast (heart, spirit, acts…)

! Mark of the beast (do not take it)

• Everyone will see Jesus Christ come on clouds (each knee will bow)

• Judgment of God
Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees!
Exceed the righteousness of the scribes and Pharisees
Battle of Armageddon and fall of Babylone

In a video, a pastor said \"Nous sommes esclaves de Dieu\", in French.

Translation: \"We are slaves of God\" !

Really?! Let\'s check in the bible.

I only found 1 verse with \"esclaves de Dieu\", in French. l 45 6 22 22 Let\'s check the verse in other languages: k 45 6 22 22 d 45 6 22 22 v 45 6 22 22 a 45 6 22 22 In fact the French translation was bad and the exact word should be \"serviteurs\" (servants, servi, siervos, servos).



Another mistake:
l 48 4 7 7 Let\'s check the verse in other languages: k 48 4 7 7 d 48 4 7 7 v 48 4 7 7 a 48 4 7 7

But this one is correct: l 66 1 1 1 k 66 1 1 1 d 66 1 1 1 v 66 1 1 1 a 66 1 1 1

40 23 11 11

So the pastor didn\'t check the translation and I informed him.
Thou art my Son, this day have I begotten thee
